mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BIZ_APPROVE a SET a.BECOME_EFFECTIVE_MARK = '06' WHERE a.APPROVE_ID = ( SELECT ad.APPROVE_ID FROM TB_BIZ_AMOUNT_DETAIL_APPROVE ad WHERE ad.AMOUNT_DETAIL_ID = #{amountDetailId} ) AND a.CREDIT_MODE IN ( '03', '05' )

update tb_con_subcontract r set r.subcontract_status = '05' where r.subcontract_id in (select t.subcontract_id from tb_con_subcontract_rel t where t.contract_id = #{contractId}) and nvl(r.IF_TOP_SUBCON,'0') = '0'

UPDATE TB_CON_CONTRACT_INFO ci SET ci.CON_STATUS = NVL(( SELECT MAX( '05' ) FROM TB_LOAN_SUMMARY ls WHERE ls.CONTRACT_ID = ci.CONTRACT_ID AND ls.SUMMARY_STATUS_CD != '06' ), '04' ) WHERE CONTRACT_ID = #{contractId}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT e.BIZ_TYPE , e.BIZ_TYPE_FLAG , e.APPLY_MODE_TYPE
FROM tb_con_contract_info b, tb_biz_amount_detail_approve c, Tb_Biz_Amount_approve d, tb_biz_approve e WHERE
b.amount_detail_id = c.amount_detail_id AND c.amount_id = d.amount_id AND d.approve_id = e.approve_id
and b.CONTRACT_ID = #{contractId}
select r.contract_num from tb_con_contract_info r, tb_biz_summary s, tb_loan_summary l where r.contract_id = l.contract_id and l.summary_id = s.summary_id and s.apply_id = #{applyId}
SELECT ls.CONTRACT_ID FROM TB_BIZ_SUMMARY bs INNER JOIN TB_LOAN_SUMMARY ls ON bs.SUMMARY_ID = ls.SUMMARY_ID WHERE bs.APPLY_ID = #{applyId}

SELECT * FROM (
SELECT '' PERIOD_NUM, CONTRACT_NUM num, '00' con_type, PRODUCT_TYPE, CONTRACT_AMT amt, TO_CHAR( BEGIN_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) BEGIN_DATE, TO_CHAR( END_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) END_DATE, contract.currency_cd, contract.CONTRACT_DATE, tcp.party_name FROM tb_con_contract_info contract LEFT JOIN tb_csm_party tcp ON contract.party_id = tcp.party_id WHERE contract.CON_STATUS = '03'
UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT '' PERIOD_NUM, a.subcontract_num num, a.subcontract_type con_type, '' product_type, DECODE( a.if_top_subcon, '1', a.zgbjxe, DECODE( a.subcontract_type, '03', a.bzjje, a.subcontract_amt )) amt, TO_CHAR( DECODE( a.if_top_subcon, '1', a.begin_date, c.begin_date ), 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) begin_date, TO_CHAR( DECODE( a.if_top_subcon, '1', a.end_date, c.end_date ), 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) end_date, a.bz currency_cd, c.contract_date, tcp.party_name FROM tb_con_subcontract a INNER JOIN tb_con_subcontract_rel b ON a.subcontract_id = b.subcontract_id LEFT JOIN tb_con_contract_info c ON b.contract_id = c.contract_id LEFT JOIN tb_csm_party tcp ON a.party_id = tcp.party_id
AND a.subcontract_status = '03' and a.subcontract_type !='04' union all SELECT DISTINCT '' PERIOD_NUM, a.subcontract_num num, a.subcontract_type con_type, '' product_type, DECODE( a.if_top_subcon, '1', a.zgbjxe, DECODE( a.subcontract_type, '03', a.bzjje, a.subcontract_amt )) amt, TO_CHAR( DECODE( a.if_top_subcon, '1', a.begin_date, c.begin_date ), 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) begin_date, TO_CHAR( DECODE( a.if_top_subcon, '1', a.end_date, c.end_date ), 'yyyy-mm-dd' ) end_date, a.bz currency_cd, c.contract_date, tc.party_name FROM tb_con_subcontract a INNER JOIN tb_con_subcontract_rel b ON a.subcontract_id = b.subcontract_id LEFT JOIN tb_con_contract_info c ON b.contract_id = c.contract_id LEFT JOIN (select listagg(tx.party_name,',') within group(order by party_name) as party_name, listagg(tx.party_id,',') within group(order by party_name) as party_id, ty.subcontract_id from tb_grt_guarantee_basic tz, tb_con_sub_grt_rel ty,tb_csm_party tx where tz.surety_id=ty.surety_id and tz.party_id=tx.party_id and (ty.grt_status !='04' or ty.grt_status is null) group by ty.subcontract_id ) tc on a.subcontract_id=tc.subcontract_id
AND a.subcontract_status = '03' and a.subcontract_type ='04' UNION ALL SELECT clc.PERIOD_NUM, CONTRACT_NUM num, clc.LOAN_CHANGE_TYPE con_type, ci.PRODUCT_TYPE PRODUCT_TYPE, ci.RMB_AMT amt, TO_CHAR( ci.BEGIN_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) BEGIN_DATE, TO_CHAR( ci.END_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) END_DATE, ci.CURRENCY_CD, ci.contract_date, tcp.party_name FROM TB_CON_LOAN_CHANGE clc INNER JOIN TB_CON_CONTRACT_INFO ci ON clc.CONTRACT_ID = ci.CONTRACT_ID LEFT JOIN tb_csm_party tcp ON ci.party_id = tcp.party_id
AND clc.CHANGE_STATUS in ('02','03') AND ci.CON_STATUS = '03' AND clc.LOAN_CHANGE_TYPE='06' UNION ALL SELECT '' PERIOD_NUM, ci.CONTRACT_NUM num, '07' con_type, ci.PRODUCT_TYPE PRODUCT_TYPE, ci.RMB_AMT amt, TO_CHAR( ci.BEGIN_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) BEGIN_DATE, TO_CHAR( ci.END_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) END_DATE, ci.CURRENCY_CD, ci.contract_date, tcp.party_name FROM tb_Adjust_Margincalls tam INNER JOIN TB_CON_CONTRACT_INFO ci ON tam.CONTRACT_ID = ci.CONTRACT_ID LEFT JOIN tb_csm_party tcp ON ci.party_id = tcp.party_id
AND tam.MARGIN_STATUS = '03' ) t WHERE 1 = 1
